title: #312: The Complete Lydiot's Guide To Melbourne
description:
So much to talk about today: Melbourne is back! The premiere is tomorrow, but we've got the recap today! Then it's on to the latest exploits of RHONY. Plus, The Bravos and some subpar developments on Below Deck: Med. Great stuff!

00:00:00 - Intro
00:04:37 - Crappens Mailbag
00:20:35 - The Bravos
00:32:40 - Real Housewives of Melbourne Premiere
01:31:23 - Real Housewives of New York City
02:07:28 - Below Deck Med
